fields.name: Inspiration:
fields.value:
Among Us
Defense: Basic Auto-Vest against Evils

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose any role to appear as.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have to choose to be a different role every night.
- The first time an evil player dies other than you, the town learns that there’s a shapeshifter in game.
- You are treated as a good player for specific role interactions. For example, if you are shot by a vigilante, they will die the next night.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See town lose while you’re dead or alive.
